page.title: 20Movement in the area 3
page.content: Compare this with the 1980-1985 register:1 milkman,soldier,teacher, farm manager,computer manager,police officer and 2nursery men are recorded. The burial register 1839-1841 shows most of the deaths to be of the very young,age 65years being the exception. During 1985 the deaths have been mainly of the old and the very old.The oldest being 91 years and the youngest by far being 48 years. The influx of people who do not need to rely on the land for their living has brought a luxury quality to the area which makes it increasingly difficult for the local inhabitants to continue living in the same way that they have done,perhaps for generations. To redress the balance new businesses and investment are needed to replace the declining dependence on the land.
